column1: #text=Using a school or public library is a great thing to do .
#text=While I 'm at the library , I like to peruse the shelves and see if there is anything that catches my attention .
#text=If I do n't see anything I like , I can use the online catalog to find something that I either need or want .
#text=It 's simple to find books on the shelves if I write down the call number and follow the signs directing to that area .
#text=Once my book is in hand , I prepare by getting out my library card and heading toward the circulation desk .
#text=Some libraries now have self-service checkout areas , while others still require you working with a clerk or librarian to check out .
#text=At the self service kiosk , I scan my library card and then scan the barcode on my book .
#text=It 's quite simple and helps the line move more quickly than waiting at the circulation desk .
#text=Once it is checkout out , I will get a reciept telling me when the book is due and I am free to go home with my book .
